channel.title: Sword Art Online Ruined Anime for me
channel.description: So the anime pretty much made it where I don't want to watch anything anymore... Edit: I liked season one, but season two was bad in my opinion.

item.title: Sword Art Online Ruined Anime for me
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“mod eldest, post:12, topic:550452”][quote author=kronikz link=topic=669359.msg4479104#msg4479104 date=1428371870]
SAO was pretty shit in the second season, but I thought season one was pretty cool. Keep in mind it was one of my first anime a couple years ago.

It did frustrate me however how they skipped so many floors. I hope they don’t skip a lot in No Game No Life.
[/quote]

Care to explain why you thought it was shit?[/quote]

Because it’s fan serviced to provide what people like you want to happen. Like jesus you can guess what’s going to happen next in every episode.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword Art Online Ruined Anime for me
item.dc:creator: @Sapphirus Sapphirus
item.description:
@Sapphirus wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:8, topic:550452”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=669359.msg4477220#msg4477220 date=1426723198]

Am I the only that actually liked SAO?
[/quote]No SAO is good.

Yeah, it was good but the second season was pretty unnessary to where I stopped watching it. It had gotten boring for me and I didn’t think it was going to go on longer than the first season because I couldn’t have thought what could have been done with it after they had gotten out of the game and being trapper in it and all.

Love the song btw.[/quote]

I’m halfway through the second season and I actually don’t think it’s that bad (Might be a minority opinion on this forum). But I have to disagree with you on season two being unnecessary as without story progression the story line would just stagnate.

Read full topic

Love the song btw.
